snippet.title: A first course in module theory
snippet.description: A first course in module theory / Keating, ME This book is an introduction to module theory for the reader who knows something about linear algebra and ring theory [...] Singapore : World Scientific, 1998. - 271 p.

snippet.title: Motivic Milnor fibers and Jordan normal forms of Milnor monodromies
snippet.description: Motivic Milnor fibers and Jordan normal forms of Milnor monodromies / Matsui, Yutaka ; Takeuchi, Kiyoshi By calculating the equivariant mixed Hodge numbers of motivic Milnor fibers introduced by Denef-Loeser, we obtain explicit formulas for the Jordan normal forms of Milnor monodromies. [...] arXiv:1202.5076. \- 2012\. Preprint

snippet.title: Matrix Operations for Engineers and Scientists : An Essential Guide in Linear Algebra
snippet.description: Matrix Operations for Engineers and Scientists : An Essential Guide in Linear Algebra / Jeffrey, Alan Engineers and scientists need to have an introduction to the basics of linear algebra in a context they understand. [...] Dordrecht : Springer, 2010.

snippet.title: Constructive Perturbation Theory for Matrices with Degenerate Eigenvalues
snippet.description: Constructive Perturbation Theory for Matrices with Degenerate Eigenvalues / Welters, Aaron Let A(z) be an analytic square matrix and $\lambda_{0}$ an eigenvalue of A(0) of multiplicity m. [...] arXiv:0905.4051. \- 2009\. Preprint

snippet.title: Topics In General Relativity : Semiclassical Relativity, Post-newtonian Theory And Radiation Reaction
snippet.description: Topics In General Relativity : Semiclassical Relativity, Post-newtonian Theory And Radiation Reaction / Tichy, W This thesis is about four research projects. [...] Ithaca, NY : Cornell Univ., 2001. - 167 p.
